query: SELECT ca.id, ca.analystId, ca.reportId, ca.priority, ca.status, wr.title FROM case_assignments ca JOIN watchdog_reports wr ON ca.reportId = wr.id;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3VC7xi4RHX81jG7.65112bc774d1 --database K34VNBtbDJyjtW8qhrCBdB --execute SELECT ca.id, ca.analystId, ca.reportId, ca.priority, ca.status, wr.title FROM case_assignments ca JOIN watchdog_reports wr ON ca.reportId = wr.id;

rows.title: Gender bias detected in job recommendation AI
AI chatbot providing medical advice without disclaimer
Privacy concern: AI assistant storing conversation history
AI content moderation flagging legitimate news as misinformation
Facial recognition system showing racial bias in accuracy
